name: Accounts by Owner
description: See the distribution of your accounts by owner. Originates from the Gallery.

salesforce.name: Accounts
salesforce.description: See information for all your Salesforce accounts including date created, billing country, owner, and more. Originates from the Gallery.

props.SOQLQuery:
SELECT Name, Owner.Name, BillingCountry, BillingState, Type, CreatedDate
FROM Account
